des:
Set high upon the crest of a mountain ridge above Peru\'s Sacred Valley lies the fabled 15th Century Inca citadel Machu Picchu. Know more such interesting facts with this skill. 

Source: https://www.thefactsite.com/machu-picchu-facts/
